Token.Abstract: Represents an Objective-C method that is exposed to the Mockingbird environment as an MBML function.
Returns the name of the function. A function's name determines how it is invoked from within an MBML expression.
Returns the name of the function. A function's name determines how it is invoked from within an MBML expression.
Returns the name of the function. A function's name determines how it is invoked from within an MBML expression.
Returns the input type of the function. The input type determines the format of the parameters (if any) expected by the function.
Returns the input type of the function. The input type determines the format of the parameters (if any) expected by the function.
Returns the input type of the function. The input type determines the format of the parameters (if any) expected by the function.
Returns the output type of the function. Functions return either an object or no output.
Returns the output type of the function. Functions return either an object or no output.
Returns the output type of the function. Functions return either an object or no output.
Initializes a new MBMLFunction instance.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the function.

Parameter.Name: inputType
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input type.

Parameter.Name: outputType
Parameter.Abstract: The function's output type.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The implementing class of the function.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector of the implementing method.

ReturnValue.Abstract: self

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that it contains the expected number of parameters. Validation will fail if the parameter list doesn't contain the exact number of parameters expected.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: expectedCnt
Parameter.Abstract: The exact number of parameters expected by the function.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of parameters contained in the array, or 0 if parameter validation fails.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that it contains the expected number of parameters. Validation will fail if the parameter list contains fewer than the expected number of parameters.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: expectedCnt
Parameter.Abstract: The minimum number of parameters expected by the function.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of parameters contained in the array, or 0 if parameter validation fails.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that it contains the expected number of parameters. Validation will fail if the parameter list contains more than the expected number of parameters.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: expectedCnt
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum number of parameters expected by the function.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of parameters contained in the array, or 0 if parameter validation fails.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that it contains the expected number of parameters. Validation will fail if the parameter list contains fewer than or more than the expected number of parameters.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: minCnt
Parameter.Abstract: The minimum number of parameters expected by the function.

Parameter.Name: maxCnt
Parameter.Abstract: The maximum number of parameters expected by the function.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of parameters contained in the array, or 0 if parameter validation fails.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that a given index is within range for the array. Validation will fail if the array index is greater than the last index in the array.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index that's expected to be within range for the parameter array.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of parameters contained in the array, or 0 if parameter validation fails.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that an object at a given array index is of an expected class. Validation will fail if the parameter at that array index is not a kind of the expected class.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The expected class of the parameter at the given array index.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter at the given array index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that an object at a given array index is among a list of expected classes. Validation will fail if the parameter at the specified index is not a kind of one of the expected classes.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: classes
Parameter.Abstract: An array of classes against which to validate the parameter at the specified index. Validation succeeds if the parameter is an instance of one of those classes.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter at the given array index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that an object at a given array index is a string. Validation will fail if the parameter at the specified index is not an NSString instance.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the string at the given array index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that an object at a given array index is a number. Validation will fail if the parameter at the specified index is not a numeric value.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the number at the given array index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that an object at a given array index is an array. Validation will fail if the parameter at the specified index is not an NSArray instance.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the array at the given array index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's parameter list array to ensure that an object at a given array index is a dictionary. Validation will fail if the parameter at the specified index is not an NSDictionary instance.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the dictionary at the given array index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure that the object is an instance of an expected class. Validation will fail if the parameter is not a kind of the expected class.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The expected class of the input parameter.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter object is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure that the object's class is among a list of expected classes. Validation will fail if the is not a kind of one of the expected classes.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: classes
Parameter.Abstract: An array of classes against which to validate the parameter. Validation succeeds if the parameter is an instance of one of those classes.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter object is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure that the object responds to the provided selector. Validation will fail if the object does not respond to that selector.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to test against the input parameter.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter object is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure that it is a string. Validation will fail if the parameter is not an NSString instance.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter string is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure it contains a numeric value. Validation will fail if the parameter is not a number.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter number is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure it is an array. Validation will fail if the parameter is not an NSArray instance.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter array is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates a function's input parameter to ensure it is a dictionary. Validation will fail if the parameter is not an NSDictionary instance.

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: The function's input parameter.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the parameter dictionary is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates an expression parameter list to ensure that the expression at the specified array index yields an NSString when evaluated.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the string resulting from evaluating the expression at the specified parameter index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates an expression parameter list to ensure that the expression at the specified array index yields a numeric value when evaluated.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the number resulting from evaluating the expression at the specified parameter index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates an expression parameter list to ensure that the expression at the specified array index yields an NSArray when evaluated.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the array resulting from evaluating the expression at the specified parameter index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Validates an expression parameter list to ensure that the expression at the specified array index yields an NSDictionary when evaluated.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: An array containing the function's input parameters.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The array index of the parameter being validated.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if parameter validation fails. Note that this must not be a nil value. If a previous validation error occurred and *errPtr already contains an error object, further parameter validation will not be performed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If validation succeeds, the dictionary resulting from evaluating the expression at the specified parameter index is returned. If validation fails, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Called by the expression engine to execute the function.

Parameter.Name: input
Parameter.Abstract: The input parameter(s) for the function.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: A memory location where a pointer to an MBMLFunctionError instance will be placed if function execution fails.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The function's return value. nil is returned if an error occurred while executing the function.

Token.Abstract: Returns a human-readable description of the receiver.
